params.data: Encoded function calls to be executed in the batch.

returns.results: Array of bytes arrays, each representing the return data from each function call executed.

params.multicallData: An array of bytes arrays, each representing an encoded function call on this contract
params.permit2Signature: A permit2 signature for the batch approval
params.permitBatch: An array of `PermitApproval` structs, each representing an ERC20 permit request
params.permitSignatures: An array of bytes, corresponding to the permit request signature in `permitBatch`

returns.results: Array of bytes arrays, each representing the return data from each function call executed

querySwapExactIn((address,(address,addre.details: Min amounts out specified in the paths are ignored.

params.paths: Swap paths from token in to token out, specifying exact amounts in
params.userData: Additional (optional) data required for the query

returns.amountsOut: Calculated amounts of output tokens to be received, ordered by output token address
returns.pathAmountsOut: Calculated amounts of output tokens corresponding to the last step of each given path

querySwapExactOut((address,(address,addr.details: Max amounts in specified in the paths are ignored.

params.paths: Swap paths from token in to token out, specifying exact amounts out
params.userData: Additional (optional) data required for the query

returns.amountsIn: Calculated amounts of input tokens to be received, ordered by input token address
returns.pathAmountsIn: Calculated amounts of input tokens corresponding to the last step of each given path

params.deadline: Deadline for the swap, after which it will revert
params.paths: Swap paths from token in to token out, specifying exact amounts in
params.userData: Additional (optional) data required for the swap
params.wethIsEth: If true, incoming ETH will be wrapped to WETH and outgoing WETH will be unwrapped to ETH

returns.amountsOut: Calculated amounts of output tokens, ordered by output token address
returns.pathAmountsOut: Calculated amounts of output tokens corresponding to the last step of each given path

params.paths: Swap paths from token in to token out, specifying exact amounts out
params.userData: Additional (optional) data required for the swap
params.wethIsEth: If true, incoming ETH will be wrapped to WETH and outgoing WETH will be unwrapped to ETH

returns.amountsIn: Calculated amounts of input tokens, ordered by input token address
returns.pathAmountsIn: Calculated amounts of input tokens corresponding to the first step of each given path

getSender().notice: Get the first sender which initialized the call to Router.

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

permitBatchAndCall((address,address,addr.notice: Permits multiple allowances and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

querySwapExactIn((address,(address,addre.notice: Queries a swap operation involving multiple paths (steps), specifying exact input token amounts.

querySwapExactOut((address,(address,addr.notice: Queries a swap operation involving multiple paths (steps), specifying exact output token amounts.

swapExactIn((address,(address,address,bo.notice: Executes a swap operation involving multiple paths (steps), specifying exact input token amounts.

swapExactOut((address,(address,address,b.notice: Executes a swap operation involving multiple paths (steps), specifying exact output token amounts.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function BatchRouter.swapExactInHook(struct IBatchRouter.SwapExactInHookParams calldata) returns (uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

argumentTypes.typeString: function BatchRouter.swapExactInHook(struct IBatchRouter.SwapExactInHookParams calldata) returns (uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function BatchRouter.swapExactOutHook(struct IBatchRouter.SwapExactOutHookParams calldata) returns (uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

argumentTypes.typeString: function BatchRouter.swapExactOutHook(struct IBatchRouter.SwapExactOutHookParams calldata) returns (uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IBatchRouter.SwapExactInHookParams calldata) returns (uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)
function () view returns (struct TransientEnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer)
function (struct TransientEnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (address[] memory)
function () view returns (struct TransientEnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer)
function () view returns (struct TransientEnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer)
function (struct AddLiquidityParams memory) external returns (uint256[] memory,uint256,bytes memory)
function () view returns (struct TransientEnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer)

documentation.text:
@dev Executes every swap path in the given input parameters.
 Computes inputs for the path, and aggregates them by token and amounts as well in transient storage.
